Text:
cgculpepper:

hi. i just finished downloading this movie. I burned it on a disc. unfortunately to my disappointment when i played in on tv the whole language is russian. how do I play it english on tv?

any tips? :))

If you have VLC media player click on audio tracks. There should be two tracks listed. I think english is the second track. Or click on video and then subtitles and select from english from that menu. For this movie I believe it's under audio.
